body: Recently in some nebula maps if someone knocks me out of the world or if I fall out of the world I die more than once? This has really been getting on my nerves and lowering my KD too. This glitch usually happens to me on Quintus but sometimes on other maps too...Anyways I was just wondering if you guys have been getting this glitch too.

title: Multiple Death Glitch in Nebula?

replies.body: Happens all the time. Especially in Quintus.
replies.body_tagged: Happens all the time. Especially in Quintus.
